inn1.comm: swings it away from the right hander and he pokes his bat out at it
gets slightly beside the line and pushes it down to cover
off the mark, he angles it down to third man, Malinga's getting some away movement here
that's a fizzer of a full toss down the leg side, sure Nazir would've been wishing he spanked that
false shot, he pokes his bat out at one which moves away, not much pace on the ball this time
risky, he gets his elbow high to fend off a rising delivery but he just manages to control it as the ball beats point
the ball stops off the pitch a bit and he softly angles it down to point
streaky boundary, he drives away from the body and gets an inside edge which misses the leg stump and rolls away to fine leg
plays with a much straighter bat this time and pushes it just wide of mid-off
punched off the front foot back to the bowler and the ball lobs off Thushara's palms
plays a neat on drive but finds mid-on
stays right behind the line and punches it to the covers
driven nicely off the bat but once again he can't quite get the placement right, mid-off picks it up
gets nicely behind the line and defends to the off side
strays down the leg side and he tries to work it down to fine leg but misses

Appeal: He gets forward and pushes it towards Mathews at mid-off and sets off, he's up against Mathews' aim and there's a direct hit at the bowler's end but the dive saves Akmal, the third umpire takes a look
driven nicely down the pitch and mid-on picks it up
stays right behind the line and defends
stays beside the line and softly taps it to the off side
whips it away but finds short midwicket, uses his wrists well to work it across the line all the same
angles it on the pads and he helps it across to fine leg

Appeal: All the Sri Lankans were absolutely sure but Gamini Silva wasn't, Nazir attempts to pull it away but plays too early, there was a sound as the ball left the bat, looked like an inside edge, looks like Nazir's been handed a life
tries to flat bat it down to the off side but finds mid-off
angled on the pads and worked away to fine leg
nice timing on that one, leans forward slightly to a fullish delivery and places it just wide of Kandamby at mid-off who dives to his left
opportunity to work it down to fine leg, looks like the ball clipped his pad on the way to the keeper
once again the ball stops a bit on the surface, Nazir gets forward and defends with a dead bat
really pounds the pitch with that bouncer, he steps down the pitch but then withdraws the shot
strays on the body and he clips it down to square leg
pushes it down the track with a straight bat
punches it just on front of mid-on and sets off for single

that's a nasty yorker followed by a vociferous appeal, heads straight for his toes and appears to him perhaps wide of the leg stump line, Steve Davis thinks about it and doesn't raise the finger, I need to see another replay of that
gets an inside edge and the ball rolls to the on side
gets beside the line and defends to the off side
get a half stride forward and defends to the off side
clips him across the line and the ball rolls behind square on the on side
gets to the pitch of the ball and drives firmly and beats cover, the ball slows down before the fielder picks it up
comes down the track and imperiously whips him across the line after fetching it from the off stump, midwicket gives the chase but the outfield beats him
classic shot, Malinga drops it short of a length outside off and Nazir gets beside the line and steers him wide of the gap between point and cover with little effort
slower ball and Nazir angles it down to point
pushes it behind square on the off side for a single
walks across the line and defend with soft hands to the off side
punched off the front foot but finds Mathews at mid-off
a little slower this time, angling in on the middle stump, he clips him to square leg
gets behind the line and defends it to the off side
that had to be spanked, Thushara drops it short on this slow pitch and Akmal obliges by slashing him over backward point, brave attempt at a catch but an impossible one
pushes it down the pitch
gets across and pushes him down to mid-off
take that! He backs away to a good length delivery, exposes all his stumps and thumps it past the gap between mid-off and cover, like swatting a fly
angles it on the pads and he nudges it past the keeper

he survives another close lbw appeal! The ball swings in late and traps him at the base of the pad perhaps in front of leg stump, Davis shakes his head, very close shout and I think Nazir's lucky again
gets behind the line and defends to the off side
oh dear, Malinga completely loses control of that and sprays it so wide down the leg side that Sanga had no chance
tries to clip him across the line but the ball doesn't come on very quickly
signs of the sluggish surface again, the short ball stops on him and he manages to fend it away
Malinga's getting the late inswing again, Nazir gets forward and smothers the movement
another inswinger almost on a yorker length, he gets forward and keeps it away
nice shot, Thushara strays on the pads and Kamran moves his feet and whips him high over midwicket almost on one leg
terrible delivery, wide outside the off stump, no chance of chasing that
fires it on the blockhole outside off and the batsman tries to dig it out
similar delivery outside off and he squirts it out to third man
shot! He gets forward, almost on his knees and scoops a full length delivery over backward point, clears the fielder comfortably
high full toss and Nazir's late afternoon slog yields nothing! He steps down the pitch and swings across the line but fails to read the full toss and the ball cannons onto his off stump
gets beside the line and defends to the off side

confusion, confusion, confusion.... He works it to short fine leg and I don't think kamran realised he hit it straight to the fielder, he saunters out of the crease for the run and he can thank his lucky stars the throw was wide, Younis is peeved
good shot, he gets to the pitch of the ball and punches it off the front foot wide of mid-off and cover
pushes it towards the covers for a single
clips it across the line and finds mid-on
gets across his stumps ans defends softly to the off side
nice delivery, kicks up off the seam and just fizzes past the outside edge, the ball holds its line before reaching the keeper
stays behind the line and defends to the off side
punched off the front foot and Kandamby fumbles and loses his balance on the rebound, comical error but it doesn't cost him anything
gets beside the line and defends to the off side
turns the face of the bat and mistimes the drive to cover
gets his elbows high and punches it to the on side, Tharanga does really well to slide to his left and intercept it
wide outside off and he mistimes the punch, ends up chopping it down to point
gets a half stride forward and defends to the off side
skids it through on middle and off and he taps it back to the bowler
fullish in length outside off and he punches it past the covers, nice timing and Jayawardene does well to give the chase
fullish in length outside off, he defends to the off side
angles it on the off stump and he drives straight to the covers
gets forward and drives square very firmly and finds cover point, two fielders are stationed very close to each other there
gives him some width outside off and he crashes it hard down to sweeper cover
take that for timing! He gets behind the line to a full delivery and despatches it past mid-off and cover, basically beat several blue shirts on the off side
stays behind the line and defends back to the bowler
bowls a tight line and length, no width to work with, he steers it down to point
stand and deliver, Kamran takes a couple of paces down the pitch to a good length delivery and only bends his knee slightly before crashing the ball square of the wicket on the off side
slower ball and he defends with a dead bat
pushes it to mid-on for a single
flirts with it outside the off stump and nearly edges the ball as he tries to dab it away
stays beside the line and defends to the off side
gets forward and chips it in the air but no danger of a return catch
gets forward to a full delivery and drives to the covers
close! Younis gets forward a little too early and gets a thick leading edge which beats Bandara's dive to his left
gets forward and drives to sweeper cover
makes room and crashes it past the covers for a single
defends with a dead bat down the pitch
he's hitting them well today, thumps a good length delivery off the meat of the bat to sweeper cover
slower delivery outside off and he steers him down to third man
fullish in length outside off and driven straight to Jayawardene at cover
quite stylish! He reaches out to a wide delivery outside off, rolls his wrists, bends his knee slightly and cracks it square of the wicket on the off side, forget about chasing that
nice way to bring up his fifty, he gets beside the line, opens the face of the bat  and cheekily glides it past the wicketkeeper and third man's too square to even get close to it
knocks it down to midwicket for a single
gets forward and drives him down to mid-off
flighted outside off and driven down to long-off
flighted on middle and leg and he clips it to midwicket
ripper of a deliveryk, beats Kamran in flight, turn and bounce
fired in quicker, he defends in front of leg stump
drives but finds short third man
skids through outside off and he punches it to the sweeper cover
comes through quickly outside off and he tries to cut but misses
gets forward and drives to the off side
drives to sweeper cover
tries to swipe him across the line but gets an inside edge
gives it a lot of air, he decides to play from the crease and drives to deep cover
pushes a single to long-on
gets on his knee and spanks it to deep square leg
the death rattle will hurt Akmal, he shapes to sweep with the ball pitched outside leg, he's onto the shot too early and the ball spins off the rough and hits the off stump
stays back and pushes it back to the bowler
looked like the slow medium pacer, lands on the off stump line and he pushes it to long-off
full outside off and driven wide of the sweeper cover, he picks up a couple
no turn, Yousuf steers him to point
steers it down to cover
tries to flat bat it but ends up pushing it back to the bowler
fullish in length on middle and leg and he works it to mid-on
gives it a lot of air, defends back to the bowler
fullish outside off and steered down to point
full outside off and pushed to long-off
works it to deep square leg
stays back, waits for the turn and works it to midwicket, Bandara sprints across to cut it off
defends with a dead bat back to the bowler
gets across and pushes him to mid-on
no turn at all, Yousuf pushes it through the line to long-off
defended with a dead bat

lazy shot by Yousuf, Mendis flights it outside off and gets the  ball to come on straight, Yousuf drives away from the body and edges it to first slip, Jayawardene juggles and takes it in the second attempt
full outside off and driven to mid-off
defended to the off side
gets beside the line and works him to sweeper cover
tucks him across the line to mid-on
stays at the crease, waits for the turn before whipping him to deep midwicket, Kandamby and Malinga converge and Kandamby fires the throw to the bowler
sweeps too early and the ball clips his pads and rolls away
full outside off and driven to the off side
works his wrists and turns it to fine leg
stays back and punches it right back to the bowler
slashes hard and nearly edges it to Sanga who does well to gather that skidder
works it to deep midwicket
bowls it much flatter and drops it a bit short, he goes back and cuts to sweeper cover
gets forward and defends with a dead bat
flighted outside off and he makes room and cuts to sweeper cover

quite straightforward, Bandara flights it on middle and off, Misbah gets a huge stride forward, tries to work it to the on side but leaves a gap between bat and pad, the ball holds its line and strikes him on the base of the pad in front of the stumps, umpire Gamini Silva gives him out
gets forward and drives to mid-off
gets well forward and drives straight to cover
makes a bit of room and slaps it to deep cover
gets well forward and drives uppishly square of the wicket and Kandamby does well to slide to his left and cut it off
makes room and cuts with the turn to the sweeper cover
full outside off and driven straight to Kapugedera at cover
full outside off and driven to long-off
gives it a lot of air on middle and leg, he makes room and drives to long-off
he gets sharp turn this time and Younis just manages to get some bat on it as he steers it to the off side
gets on his knee and sweeps to fine leg
clips it away to deep square leg for a couple
holds the length back, he cuts square of the wicket
driven straight to short cover who parries it back to the bowler
clips it to fine leg
shot of the evening, Umar clears the front leg, makes a lot of room and gets on his knee and carts him over long-on
gets on the backfoot and pushes him to the off side
goes back and clips him to midwicket
gets on his knee, fetches him from outside off and works it to deep midwicket
full outside off and driven to the off side
drives but finds short cover
flighted on middle and leg, he works it to the on side
stays back, waits for the turn and flicks against the turn to deep mid-on
flighted outside off, he gets forward and chips him down to wide long-off
the off cutter this time, he rocks back and pulls over square leg
stays beside the line and steers him to point
lunges forward and pushes it to the covers
turn and bounce, nearly gets a leading edge
gets well forward and smothers the spin
flipped out with some air outside off stump and he plays a reverse sweep, just doesn't time it well and gets an inside edged to the leg side
good overspin and loop on that one, dips on middle and leg and this one is on-driven toward midwicket with ease
too short and he goes back to splice the ball past point
fuller and faster and he square-drives straight to point
flatter ball forces him onto the back foot, driving for a single
full again on middle and leg and thats punched to mid-on for one
full and well down the pads, there's a sound as Younis goes for the flick but no contact and the sharp reverse swing beats a diving Sangakkara too
back of a length just outside off and he steers it toward point
overpitched this time and Younis drives just wide of cover and point
bouncer down leg stump, Umar flinches as the ball kicks past
hits a length outside off and Umar taps it down for a single
another errant delivery well outside leg and thats a wide

digs in a short one this time, forcing Younis to jump up and fend the ball down toward gully, he sets off for the single but Umar is adamant he get back and then Younis has to stretch his bat as Sangakkara flips the ball onto the stumps
good length and he defends it down to the bowler
full on middle and leg, he clips it to midwicket
makes room ,waits for the turn and cuts to sweeper cover
tucked to short square leg and there;s hesitation in the calling but the batsmen head back
gets on his knee and sweeps to fine leg
stays back, waits for the turn and knocks it back to the bowler
knocks it to long-off and retains the strike
bends his knee and square drives him past backward point
clears his back leg and whips him through midwicket, didn't really time it well
shapes to drive but gets an inside edge to square leg
stays back and thumps him down to long-on
stays beside the line and steers him down to point
shuffles at the crease and clips it wide of midwicket
he bowls a leg break, lots of flight, he digs it out
full on middle and leg and pushed to long-on
flighted down the leg side and nudged to fine leg
exuberance of youth, he clears his back leg, chips down the track and carts him for a straight six, they don't come much cleaner than that
turns it to square leg
gets well forward and drives past the covers
keeps it on the off stump and he defends back to the bowler
makes room and the slow off cutter deceives him as he gets an inside edge to his pads, Mathews appeals for an lbw but very late
opens the face of the bat and steers him to third man
stands tall and thumps it straight to cover
gets beside the line and pushes it straight to mid-off
stands tall and punches it hard but Tharanga does well at short cover to cut it off
fails to put away a low full toss, pushes it back to the bowler
defends back to the bowler
fired in quicker and flatter, he just manages to defend it away
goes for an ambitious sweep with the ball pitched outside off, Sanga whips off the bails but the back leg was back at the crease, the third umpire takes a look
fullish on middle and leg, he knocks it to long-on
knocks a low full toss to deep midwicket and that's his fifty, he must be really relieved
gets forward and pushes it to long-on
gets a long way across his stumps and clips him to wide long-on, puts pressure on the fielder there
stays behind the line and defends to the off side
stays beside the line and angles him down to third man
that's the first four in 22 overs! Umar angles his bat and plays a delicate late cut past the keeper, he knew there were no slips in place
attempts the same late cut but he places it much square this time for third man to collect it
chips it in the air but wide of the fielder at cover
slower through the air, he pushes it back to the bowler
reaches out and drives to sweeper cover
gets his front pad across and pushes it back down the pitch
opens the face of the bat and steers it to third man, Malinga fires the throw to Sanga's end and there's an appeal for a run-out but Younis' dive saves him
stays on the backfoot and punches it to sweeper cover
stays beside the line and steers him down to deep point
skids through and knocks his pads as he tries to clip it to the on side, mathews appeals half heartedly
yorker length on middle and leg and he works it to the deep on the on side, Umar makes his ground
opens the face of the bat and steers him down to third man
stays beside the line and steers it to short third man
drops it on the off side with soft hands, looks for the single
stays forward and pushes it to long-off
that's yet another fifty! He gets forward and knocks it to deep square leg and he does the sajda
makes room and cuts square of the wicket
stays back and punches him to long-on
gets well forward and chips him over extra cover for a couple
stays back and punches him to wide long-on
fires it full and wide outside off, he reaches out and scoops it over backward point
he has to deal with a very high bouncer but manages to slap it along the ground to square leg
bad bounce for Sangakkara, Malinga bowls a slower ball which passes the inside edge and the keeper fails to get a glove to it on the second bounce
tucks it to short midwicket
turns it to short third man
another delibvery skids through and beats the inside edge before reaching the keeper
attempts a reverse sweep but fails to make proper contact
gets forward and drives to long-off
he sashays down the pitch on seeing the flight and lofts him inside out over extra cover, beats the sweeper cover
even better, he goes forward initially and then rocks back on seeing the shorter length and slogs him over midwicket
gets well forward and drives to the off side
gets forward and pushes him to long-off
not the best start for Thushara, he fires it full and really wide outside off, Younis reaches out and gets enough bat on it to squirt it out to third man
dug out just wide of the bowler, they set off, hold back and then pick the single
reaches out and the outside edge rolls to third man
pushes it firmly back to the bowler
he fires it full and wide again and the batsman pushes it wide of cover
shuffles across and clips it to deep midwicket
full outside off and driven down to cover
he fires it on a good length outside off, gets his elbows high and swats it across the line over midwicket, one bounce and four
bowls it full and he clips it wide of midwicket and pushes for the second run
he fires the bouncer just down the leg side and Umar shapes to hook but the ball beats him, Silva signals a wide
this kid can bat! Malinga fires it full on the stumps and Umar clears his back leg, makes room and elegantly scoops him for a six over wide long-on, amazing follow through
closer to the blockhole and Umar manages to dig it out and pinch a single to the off side
torrid day for Malinga and Sangakkara isn;t happy, he loses control of another full toss and fires it wide down the leg side, nothing much Sangakkara could do to intercept that
gets an inside edge to his pads and the ball rolls to the off side, Malinga appeals
full and wide outside off and too wide I must say
goes for a wild swish over mid-off but fails to make contact
chases another wide delivery and the outside edge travels quickly to third man
what was Umar trying to do? He walks across his stumps to cheekily paddle away a delivery from outside off but the ball is too wide to attempt that shot but changes his mind, no wide called
reaches out to a full delivery and scoops it just over cover's reach
stays at the crease and attempts a straight six but the ball clears mid-on
fires it on middle and leg, he digs it out to the on side
this man's good! He clears the back leg to a full and inswinging delivery and scoops him over wide long-on, super shot
fires it full outside off and he digs it out to third man
and that's hit the umpire! Well he clips it firmly to square leg but Steve Davis is a little too slow to react and cops a blow to the hand, well will that cost Umar a 100?
turns it away to short midwicket
full outside off and driven to deep extra cover
meat and drink for Umar, he bends his knee to a pitched up delivery outside off and carts him down to deep midwicket
he reaches out to a wide delivery and ends up slapping it down to long-off
stylish one by the captain, he stays at the crease and clips a delivery angled on the pads and clears square leg
Younis' fine effort comes to an end, he makes room but fails to put away a full toss over the ropes, the ball splices to Kapugedera at long-on
high full toss but he gets away with it, he knocks it down to midwicket
he clips it straight to midwicket and they hesitate for the single
he fires an inswinging yorker and he manages to dig it out past the bowler
Malinga will want to forget this day, another delivery sprayed down the leg side and poor Sangakkara has a tough time
Afridi clips it away wide of square leg and gives Umar the strike
backs away and Malinga fires it down the leg side

he gets to three figures but that' appaling cricket by the Sri Lankans! He mows it to deep square leg and they push for the second run, the throw is to the keeper's end but Afridi's struggling to make his ground at the other end, sanga fires the throw to the bowler's end but there's nobody backing up behind the stumps and the fielder at mid-off makes a mess of it
nudges it to short third man
works it to deep square leg for a single

inn2.comm: appeal straightaway! The ball jags back in and hits him high on the front pad, that wasn't hitting anything
comes back in off the seam and Tharanga gets right behind the line and defends
gives him a bit of width outside off and he angles it down to third man
seam, zip and bounce! Aamer bowls it outside leg and gets it to angle across the right hander, just fizzes past the outside edge
stays nicely behind the line and defends
gets across his stumps and tucks it back to the bowler
angles it on the pads and he clips it down to square leg
keeps it on a good length on middle and off, he taps it back to the bowler
too wide outside off and asking to be hit, he reaches out and drives uppishly but finds the big gap between cover and point
bowls it a touch too wide outside off, reaches out to drive but the ball sneaks under the bat
stays behind the line and taps it back to the bowler
he errs by offering him width again outside off, he reaches out and drives on the up and finds the gap between the covers

Jayawardene gets into the act, Aamer lands it on the half volley outside off and Jayawardene drives firmly past the gap between mid-off and cover, that shot has spliced his bat and he needs a replacement
lands it a touch wide outside off, Jayawardene attempts a cheeky late cut but misses
gets beside the line and steers it to the off side
strays on the pads and he helps it on its way to fine leg
stays right behind the line and defends to the off side
gets across his stumps and defends right back to the bowler
doesn't do much at the crease, he pushes it with a straight bat down to mid-off
the ball rolls off his pads to the on side and Tharanga was for some reason off the blocks for a non existent single, he turns around and scampers back but the throw is wide
shot! Rana overpitches on middle and leg and Jayawardene has a free swing of the arms, takes him downtown and lofts through the line, as straight as straight can get
gets behind the line and defends to the off side
the slower ball from Rana, Jayawardene decides to defend
defends with a dead bat and the ball nearly rolls back to the stumps
crisp timing! Just a fraction of width outside off and Tharanga merely angles it past the small gap at the covers, the ball races away and Nazir gives the chase but the ball just beats him
he slashes at it and ends up scooping the ball over backward point, third man picks it up
reaches out and angles it away down to third man
angles it on the pads and he works it away wide of midwicket for a couple
checks his drive to mid-off
angles it down to third man and retains the strike
gives him a lot of width outside off and he reaches out and dabs it down to third man
keeps it on a good length on middle and off, he defends back to the bowler
shuffles at the crease and tucks it to the on side
stand and deliver, he stays at the crease, waits for the ball to come onto him and scoops him over extra cover
Pakistan get a very important strike, Rana hits the deck hard and draws Mahela onto the hook, he doesn't control it very well and the top edge swirls to Aamer at fine leg
gets behind the line and pushes it straight to Afridi at short extra cover
Sangakkara has to evade a nasty lifter from Aamer
stays nicely beside the line and plays a punched drive to cover
pushes it down to mid-off with a straight bat
taps it in front of short cover and sets off very quickly for the single
hits the deck hard again and has Tharanga on his knees in trying to evade that bouncer
another bouncer and too high for Tharanga to get some bat on that, wide called by Davis
he fends off a short delivery with control and luckily the ball drops well short of Aamer
cramps him for room to cut and he ends up getting an inside edge onto his pads
gives him width outside off and he reaches out and pushes it past short extra cover
he's foxed by that slower delivery and ends up getting a leading edge which stays in the air for a few anxious moments before dropping short of point
slower delivery on the pads and he clips it away down to fine leg
short of a length and he gives it a mighty swat, only for the ball to drop well short of any fielder on  the off side
he's timing them brilliantly tonight, gives him width outside off, he reaches out, stays beside the line and caresses it past the covers with little effort
and that's followed by a false shot, swishes outside off and misses
he reaches out and angles it away in the air to third man
chips down the track on seeing the shortish length and clubs  him wide of mid-on, lots of power behind that shot
that's two out of two, he grants him width outside off, Sanga reaches out and slaps it past the covers, rolls his wrists and sends it scorching over the turf
make that three! Drops it on a good length on middle and off and he enjoys a free swing past the bowler and mid-on
hits the deck hard and he ducks under it
bowls the slower ball from the back of the hand and Tharanga doesn't pick it well
another sharp bouncer and Tharanga ducks under it, Davis has a quiet word with the bowler
gets a thick inside edge onto the pads and they pick up a single
takes a couple of paces down the track but adjusts his shot on seeing the slower ball, clips it to midwicket
he drifts on the pads despite fine leg standing in the circle, Sanga nudges it wide of him and challenges the fielder in the deep
fullish in length outside off and he pushes it away down to mid-off
full outside off and driven straight to the covers
shot of night! Rao drops it on a good length, no seam movement, Tharanga makes room chips down the pitch and lofts through the line straight over the bowler's head
reaches out and angles it down to third man
fires it on the blockhole on seeing the batsman advance down the pitch, he fails to dig it out
picks a sharp single down to point, the throw is wide
hits the deck hard outside off and it's close to being called a wide for that bouncer

Sangakkara chips down the track and tries to whack it across the line but he doesn't pick the change of pace and the ball rolls off his pads, Rana tries to intimidate him and Sanga smiles back, all in good humour
slower ball again and he squeezes it out to the off side
slower ball and he looks to drive but misses it
full outside off and squeezed straight to cover
pounded hard down the pitch but the stumps are on the way, that would have raced away for four
overpitched well outside off, carved away towards deep point
fullish again, a touch closer to the stumps, punched off the front foot to extra cover, no run as the ball went straight to the fielder
length ball outside off, Sangakkara bends his knee and swipes the ball to the vacant midwicket region for a boundary
there was no mid-on in place, so Sangakkara took a couple of paces down the track and played a leg-stump ball uppishly towards long-on, easy single
bangs in the bouncer, Tharanga bends his back and tries to guide it through slip, doesn't connect
back of a length on off this time, Tharanga taps it off the back foot towards the bowler
slower ball on the off stump and he pushes it in front of mid-off and sets off
just not the place to bowl, he drops it too short and wide outside off, Tharanga stretches out big time and carves it to third man, the fielder had no chance
tucks it off the pads down to midwicket and he picks a sharp bowling
I'm afraid this is poor bowling, another short delivery angled across the left hander and Sangakkara plays an upper cut over the keeper's head
chips down the track and cracks a good length delivery wide of  the stumps wide of the covers, he's in imperious touch
pounded to Rana's right and he does well to dive, intercept it and fire the ball back towards the batsman in one motion
fires it full and wide outside off, he exposes his stumps and squirts it down to third man
fails to put away a full toss outside off, swishes at thin air instead
pounds a low full toss straight to Umar Akmal at extra cover, Umar nearly hurls the ball back towards the keeper
drops it a fraction short outside off, he swishes hard at thin air again
comes down the pitch and drills it to mid-off
comes over the wicket, stays back and clips him against the turn
turns this away from the left hander and beats him on the forward prod
fires it quick outside off and he places it to cover
fullish in length outside off and driven through the line to long-off
drops it short, he picks the length early, rocks back and cuts it to sweeper cover
gets forward and drops it in front of cover

straight after the drinks break, and a soft dismissal! Rao bowls a harmless half volley outside off and Sangakkara reaches out to drive, gets under the bounce and tamely scoops it to Nazir at cover point, catching practice thank you Sir
nervy start, fishes outside off to a delivery that leaves the left-hander
gets to the pitch of the ball and drives firmly straight to short cover
runs in hard and lands it on a good length outside off, he taps it firmly to point
gets beside the line and angles it down to third man
pushes it straight to the covers
waits for the turn and dabs it away very late to short third man
flighted outside off and driven to the covers
flighted on middle and leg and he slogs it down to deep midwicket, Rana dives and cuts it off
mows it down to midwicket
attempts another cheeky dab to third man but is cramped for room, the ball dribbles towards the keeper
stays right behind the line and defends back to the bowler
stays beside the line and dabs it away to square third man
drops it fractionally short on the off stump and he taps it back down the pitch
keeps it on a good length on middle and leg, he tucks it to midwicket
angles it on middle and leg, he works it back down the pitch
full outside off and driven straight to sweeper cover
eased past short cover, the fielder dives but fails to get a hand to it
fired in quick and flat, he punches it through the line to long-off
turns a bit off the rough, he chops it to short third man
clips it softly to short midwicket
gives it air on middle and off, he gets forward and defends
lands outside off and he opens the face of the bat and steers it wide of short third man, Yousuf gives the chase and the  gives up
full outside off and pushed past the covers
flighted on middle and leg, pushed to mid-on
pushed through the line to long-on and that's his fifty, Tharanga has justified his recall after a slow start to the series
rocks back and cuts against the turn to third man
stays back and cuts to the off side
meets the ball very close to the body and angles it to third man
sashays down the the pitch and defends
that's a ripper! Lands on the rough, straightens and kicks up, had the batsman all at sea
stays back and defends
goes back and cuts to the offside
not much room to cut, he ends up chopping it to short third man
tries to cut but the ball cuts back in, he steers it to short third man
pushed with the turn to long-on
clipped to the onside
on the blockhole outside off and pushed to the off side
shuffles and clips it down to square leg
flighted outside off and driven down to deep cover
pushed wide of the diving fielder at cover
gets forward and maneuvers it past the packed off side field

clever bowling from Ajmal, he bowls it quicker and holds the length back, Kandamby is forced on the backfoot and the ball comes on a lot quicker than expected, thick outside edge and Younis falls to his left and takes the catch
clips it to midwicket
flighted on middle and leg and nudged to the on side
down the leg side and clipped to fine leg, beats the fielder in the circle
clipped to midwicket
another ripper! Phew, gets it to grip off the surface and turn, fizzes past the leading edge
full outside off and driven to the off side
pushed towards the covers
shuffles across his stumps early for a premeditated paddle to fine leg
chips down the track, checks his shot and punches it to wide long-off, good running
drifts on the pads and he clips it down to midwicket
angles it down the leg side and wide called
tries to work it to the on side but the ball skids through and hits his pads
knocks it to the on side for a quick single
stays beside the line and pushed it to cover
stays forward and pushes it squarer on the off side
chips down the track, checks his shot and defends
stays right back at the crease and gets a thick inside edge onto his pads
pushes it to the off side
attempts an ambitious sweep from outside off, the ball clips his pads and there's a half-hearted appeal, missing leg
comes down the pitch and chips it in the air over the bowler's head
close call, he pushes it to short cover and pushes a sharp single, the under arm throw to Akmal is a little late, the third umpire takes a look
clips it to short fine leg
another Ajmal special beats the bat, gets nice drift and help off the pitch
stays back, waits for the turn and taps it to cover
low full toss outside off and he reaches out and drives past the big gap between cover and mid-off
gets forward and defends with a dead bat
makes room and cuts square of the wicket on the off side
gets on the front foot and defends to the off side
closes the face of the bat and glances it to deep square leg for a single
attempts a wild slash but the ball doesn't bounce as much and nearly takes the edge
sweeps and the ball strikes the pads outside the line of the stumps, Silva turns down the appeal
gets forward and there's an inside edge on to the pads

one of the most stunning outfield catches you will see! But Rana's in pain... Kapugedera chips down the track and tries to take Ajmal downtown over long-off and nearly succeeds, Rana pedals backwards, the ball swirls in the air and he throws himself backwards and takes it one-handed, cops a painful blow to the head and he lies still for a long while, his team-mates rush towards him in concern, he's all well now
stays back and defends to the off side
stays back and defends back to the bowler
drops it short and he stays right behind the line and defends
attempts a slower ball and it turns into a low full toss, he knocks it to midwicket
stays behind the line and clips it to mid-on
another one bites the dust! Rao pitches it on a good length outside off and gets it to move away just a touch, Samaraweera tries to run it down to third man but gets a thick edge to Kamran
flighted by Ajmal, punched back to the bowler
flatter and on the pads this time, Tharanga pushes it to long-on
full and on middle stump, a wristy shot towards mid-on to get off the mark
short and wide, Tharanga rocks onto the backfoot and carves it behind point
length ball on the pads, defended towards the leg side
again on leg stump, turned towards midwicket
lovely shot from Tharanga, length ball outside off, Tharanga gets on the front foot and launches it over mid-on for a boundary
that could be the end of Sri Lanka's chances, another batsman poking outside off only to nick it to the keeper, a fairly innocuous delivery which Tharanga feathers through to Akmal
Bandara pushes his first ball towards cover
length ball on offstump, Bandara gets behind the line and defends off the back foot
length ball, angling into the pads, turned towards mid-on
spearing down the leg side, Bandara wanted to glance that one but is hit on the pads, the ball rolls towards square leg and the batsmen scramble a leg bye
Pakistan edge closer to victory, Afridi lands it outside off and Bandara wasn't quite sure what to do with it, he gets a thick leading edge to first slip
stays back, waits for the turn and cuts to point
lands outside off and defends back to the bowler
loops it outside off and beats the batsman
hits his pads just outside the line of off stump, Afridi appeals
gets forward and defends with a dead bat
keeps it full on middle and off, gets well forward and defends
gets it to move away from the right hander and lands it on a full length, attempts a square drive and misses
full and swinging away, he drives straight to mid-off
picks it from outside off and hoicks him across the line and beats square leg
shuffles and works it away to the on side
timber! Rao bowls a lovely inswinger almost on the blockhole, Thushara is beaten for pace and the ball clips his pads and heads straight to the leg stump, difficult for any tail ender to pick
streaky, he lashes hard at a delivery spinning away from him, the outside edge beats the keeper and runs down to third man
they're nine down, he sashays down the track to blast it out of the stadium but fails to read the flight or the turn, one of the easiest stumpings for Kamran
lands outside off and no turn, allows it to go through to the keeper
just slides down the leg side and clips his pads
nearly catches the edge as he shapes to drive
this one grips and turns, beats the edge

and it's all over, Pakistan complete a comprehensive victory, a back of a length ball on off stump, Malinga leaves his bat hanging as he tries to defend off the back foot, gets an outside edge to first slip
